subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony shot 7 for 23 from the field as the Knicks, who set an N.B.A. record by losing their 13th straight playoff game, fell to 0-3 in their series against the Heat.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony shot 7 for 23 from the field as the Knicks, who set an N.B.A. record by losing their 13th straight playoff game, fell to 0-3 in their series against the Heat.
